text: Ne ni limanyisio lirula khu Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe khu Bandu bamanye inyanga ya Haji ikhongo mbu, toto Nyasaye ali ehale khubatsokasi nende Omurumwa wuwe yesi(ali ehale ninabo). Ne nimusaba eshileshelo awo nobulayi khwinywe, ne nimukhola omurwe omumu mumanye mbu enywe shimwakhashila Nyasaye tawe, ne subisia abakhayi mbu balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu
